tooltip.fastPrintMode:
<bold>Fast print mode</bold>
Accelerates all non-essential build platform movements, quickly repositioning between layers to minimise idle time and shorten total print duration.
tooltip.separationDetect:
<bold>Separation detect</bold>
Detects film release, reducing lift distance between layers.

May risk print defects if separation isn't properly sensed.

message.noTemplatesInfo: Templates will be listed here. Use the 'Create' button to create your first template.
message.deleteTemplateWarning: This will permanently delete any selected templates. Any existing parts that use this template will keep their template print settings.
message.changesApplyToNewParts: Changes will only apply to new parts added to the Funnel. Existing parts will be printed using the previous template settings.
